columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the token.

columns.name: auth_type
columns.description: The type of authentication used by the credentials. Possible values are: OAUTH, BASIC_AUTH, or PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.

columns.name: server_type
columns.description: The type of source provider. Possible values are: GITHUB, GITHUB_ENTERPRISE, or BITBUCKET.
